mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.id_number as idNumber ,a.phone as phone ,a.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM yonghu a
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.idNumber},'%')
and a.phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.phone},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
